revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for doors in ''[[Heretic]]''.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== The definition redirects to a different sound sequence as appropriate for the door movement. [HereticDoor 0 [[HereticDoorOpen]] 1 [[HereticDoorClose]] 2 [[HereticDoorOpen]] 3 [[HereticDoorClose]] ] [[Category:Sound sequences]]
